sources.title: Fox Pop (1942)
sources.description: Fox Pop is a 1942 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies color cartoon short supervised by Chuck Jones. The short was released on September 5, 1942. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/fox-pop-1942/

metadata.Plot: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Frank Graham, Robert C. Bruce
